info.title: CQC Data
info.description: Reports & ratings for health & social services regulated by the CQC in England

get.summary: Providers, organisations for health, social care services regulated by the CQC

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to be returned
parameters.x-ms-summary: The page to be returned

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of items to return, per page
parameters.x-ms-summary: The number of items to return, per page

parameters.name: partnerCode
parameters.description: All organisations consuming this API add an additional query parameter named partnerCode to all requests If you are a CQC Syndication partner the value for this code will be provided to you, otherwise an informative but concise code representing your organisation should be chosen
parameters.x-ms-summary: Identifying code of calling organisation

parameters.name: constituency
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Constituency (constituency attribute) matching one the values of this parameter eg "Greenwich"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Constituency value to match against

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Region (region attribute) matching the values of this parameter eg "London"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Region value to match against

parameters.name: localAuthority
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Local Authority (localAuthority attribute) matching the values of this parameter eg "Merton"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Include organisations with a localAuthority attribute matching this value

parameters.name: inspectionDirectorate
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Inspection Directorate (inspectionDirectorate attribute) matching the values of this parameter eg "Hospitals"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations with a Inspection Directorate matching value

parameters.name: nonPrimaryInspectionCategoryCode
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Non-Primary Inspection Category Code (inspectionCategoriescode attribute where inspectionCategoriesprimary="N") matching one of the values of this parameter eg "H2"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations with a matching non-primary Inspection Category

parameters.name: nonPrimaryInspectionCategoryName
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Non-Primary Inspection Category Name (inspectionCategoriesname attribute where inspectionCategoriesprimary="N") matching one of the values of this parameter eg "Acute hospital - NHS specialist" eg "Acute hospital - NHS specialist"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations with a matching non-primary Inspection Category Name

parameters.name: primaryInspectionCategoryCode
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Primary Inspection Category Code (inspectionCategoriescode attribute where inspectionCategoriesprimary="Y") matching one of the values of this parameter eg "H2"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations that match the supplied primary inspection category code

parameters.name: primaryInspectionCategoryName
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Primary Inspection Category Name (inspectionCategoriesname attribute where inspectionCategoriesprimary="Y") matching one of the values of this parameter eg "Acute hospital - NHS specialist"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations that match the supplied value for primary inspection category name

parameters.name: overallRating
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Current Overall Rating (currentRatingsoverallrating attribute) matching one of the values of this parameter eg "Good"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations must match the supplied overall rating

parameters.name: regulatedActivity
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Regulated Activity (regulatedActivitiesname attribute) eg "Maternity and midwifery services", matching the values of this parameter
parameters.x-ms-summary: Value of regulated activity the organisation must match

parameters.name: reportType
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Report Type (attribute) matching the values of this parameter eg "Location", "Provider" or "CoreService"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Return only organisations that match the supplied report type value

get.description: Get a list of provider codes

parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations with a matching Non-Primary Inspection Category Name

parameters.name: nonPrimaryInspectionCategoryCode
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Non-Primary Inspection Category Code (inspectionCategoriescode attribute where inspectionCategoriesprimary="N") matchs the value of this parameter eg "H2"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations with a matching Non-Primary Inspection Category Code

parameters.name: inspectionDirectorate
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Inspection Directorate (inspectionDirectorate attribute) matches the value of this parameter eg "Hospitals"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations where the Inspection Directorate matches this string

parameters.name: localAuthority
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Local Authority (localAuthority attribute) matches the value of this parameter eg "Merton"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations whose local authority matches this value

parameters.name: constituency
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a Constituency (constituency attribute) matching one of the values of this parameter eg "Greenwich"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations whose constituency matches this value

parameters.name: gacServiceTypeDescription
parameters.description: Include only organisations with a GAC Service Type Description (gacServiceTypesdescription) matching one of more values of this parameter eg "Hospital"
parameters.x-ms-summary: Organisations whose GAC service type matches this value

parameters.name: odsCcgName
parameters.description: Include only locations where the ODS name (odsCcgName) of the CCG selected by this organisation is known and matches the values of this parameter
parameters.x-ms-summary: Only locations where the ODS name of the CCG matches the value

parameters.name: odsCcgCode
parameters.description: Include only locations where the ODS code (odsCcgCode) of the CCG selected by this organisation is known and matches the value of this parameter
parameters.x-ms-summary: Locations where the ODS code of the CCG matches this value

parameters.name: onspdCcgName
parameters.description: Include only locations where the ONSPD CCG name (onspdCcgName) of the geographic area covering the Location's postcode matches the value of this parameter
parameters.x-ms-summary: Locations whose ONSPD CCG name matches this value

parameters.name: onspdCcgCode
parameters.description: Include only locations where the ONSPD CCG code (onspdCcgCode) of the geographic area covering the Location's postcode matches the value of this parameter
parameters.x-ms-summary: Locations where the ONSPD CCG matches the supplied value

parameters.name: careHome
parameters.description: Include only locations where the value of the attribute careHome matches the value of this parameter (Y or N)
parameters.x-ms-summary: Locations whose match the value of the careHome attribute (Y or N)

get.description: Retrieve the list of Inspection Areas which have been inspected at this location excluding any that may have been globally retired (covering services no longer inspected by CQC) Although an Inspection area may be Superseded globally for the purpose of new inspections, it will remain active (along with the ratings for that area) at a given organisation until it has been re-inspected under the superseding inspection area(s)
get.summary: Retrieve a list of inspection areas related to the specified location area

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: The organisation ID of the location
parameters.x-ms-summary: The organisation ID of the location

parameters.name: partnerCode
parameters.description: All organisations consuming this API should add an additional query parameter named partnerCode to all requests If you are a CQC Syndication partner the value for this code will be provided to you, otherwise an informative but concise code representing your organisation should be chosen
parameters.x-ms-summary: Identifying organisation code

get.summary: Provider Inspection Areas for the given location
get.description: Retrieve the list of Provider Inspection Areas which have been inspected for this organisation at Provider level, excluding any that may have been globally retired (covering services no longer inspected by CQC) Although an Inspection area may be Superseded globally for the purpose of new inspections, it will remain active (along with the ratings for that area) at a given organisation until it has been re-inspected under the superseding inspection area(s)

parameters.x-ms-summary: Identifying organisation code

get.summary: Locations related to the given Provider id
get.description: Retrieve the list of locations for this provider Locations are sites where a Provider operates Some Providers will have only one location, whereas others may have many

get.summary: List of organisations of specified type that have changed in given timeframe
get.description: The Changes service provides a mechanism of staying informed about updates to providers and locations, to allow users to refresh their cached data if necessary. Changes for two organisation types are available: provider or location. API consumers must specify a start and end date range, see the API reference for more detail. This service allows identification of which organisations have changed over time. For successive calls to this service, the startTime parameter should be set to the endTime of the previous call. The times correspond to the time that this service itself acquires the data and is not, for example, the time of data entry onto a source system.

parameters.name: organisation_type
parameters.description: The type of object for which to get a list of changes Ether location or provider
parameters.x-ms-summary: Changes for either location or provider

parameters.name: partnerCode
parameters.description: All organisations consuming this API add an additional query parameter named partnerCode to all requests If you are a CQC Syndication partner the value for this code will be provided to you, otherwise an informative but concise code representing your organisation should be chosen
parameters.x-ms-summary: Identifying organisation code

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to be returned
parameters.x-ms-summary: The page to be returned

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of items to return, per page
parameters.x-ms-summary: The number of items to return, per page

parameters.name: startTimestamp
parameters.description: ISO 8601 timestamp The period is inclusive of the start time
parameters.x-ms-summary: ISO 8601 timestamp for start

parameters.name: endTimeStamp
parameters.description: ISO 8601 timestamp for the end of the time period The period is exclusive of the end time, so only changes before this time are included
parameters.x-ms-summary: ISO 8601 timestamp for the end of the time

get.summary: Retrieve a PDF file or text content of the specified report and related document
get.description: Retrieve a PDF file or text content of the specified report and it's related document

parameters.name: inspection_report_link_id
parameters.description: A UUID for obtaining the main inspection report
parameters.x-ms-summary: A UUID for obtaining the main inspection report

parameters.name: related_document_type
parameters.description: A qualifier to retrieve a document related to the main report This parameter is the Related Document Type found from the relatedDocuments response object eg "Use%20of%20Resources" When this parameter is absent, the main report for the inspection is returned
parameters.x-ms-summary: A qualifier to retrieve a document related to the main report
